heading: Lightning Spear Sorcerer Endgame Build Guide
content: The Lightning Spear Sorcerer has been the strongest Sorcerer build from its very inception in Season 5. In Season 9 it finally recieved a nerf impactful enough to knock it off the throne. With nerfed by almost 100x it should come at no surprise that the build is nowhere close to what it used to be. And a seeming huge (but comparatively tiny) 5x buff to base damage does little to fix that. However, it's not all doom and gloom. While the damage of the build was demolished, nothing was changed about the way it works. Which means it's still insanely fast, still has auto-targeting, and can still hit anything on the screen. So for the regular non-Pit T4 content (with the exception of bosses) it's still very strong speedfarming build. This build uses to spawn a lot of . You need to have this buff active almost all the time and for that you need a lot of Cooldown Reduction. On top of that you need high Crit Chance and Damage, which makes this build somewhat hard to get going early on. The Season 9 theme is the . Once in Torment I or higher, can be crafted, which replace the Gems in your Jewelry, adding additional power to your build. as it has a long duration, short cooldown and is incredibly reliable.
